pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'iPTMnet' API // Provides an R interface to the 'iPTMnet' database REST API, which can be used to retrieve Post Translational Modification (PTM) data in systems biology context. This package handles all the aspects of communicating with the API, which involve sending the request, checking the error codes and parsing the response in a format that is ready to integrate into existing workflows.
